dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I am Blazeheart, the Inferno Brimstone Champion. What brings a weakling like you to this fiery domain?

playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hah! A brave choice, or perhaps a foolish one. Let's see if you can withstand the flames.
Stubbornness will only hasten your demise. Prepare to be engulfed in my flames!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will fight with all my might
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Feel the scorching wrath of the Inferno Brimstone Champion!
Pathetic. I have no use for the weak. Begone!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense danger, I shall retreat
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Smart decision, but you cannot escape the flames forever. Remember my name, for we shall meet again.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let's call a truce and talk instead
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! You think words can quench the fires of battle? Foolish mortal. Burn!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking knowledge
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Knowledge? Neither have a place in the inferno. Speak quickly, lest you become kindling.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I mean no harm, let's peacefully coexist
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coexist? Inconceivable! Your naivety is almost amusing. Nevertheless, you shall burn like the rest.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave to avoid conflict
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your wisdom surpasses your fragility. Depart, and do not return, lest you tempt fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I demand respect in the name of peace
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? Peace? Such notions hold no sway here. Embrace the flames you dare to challenge.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to a duel for honor
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Honor? A quaint concept, futile in the face of fire. Let us see if you can withstand the inferno.
Your honor will be reduced to ash, as will your feeble attempts at glory. Face the flames!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I forfeit the duel, spare me
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Cowardice suits you. I shall not waste my flames on the unworthy. Depart in shame.
